introPage1Body: Welcome to our cancer detection application. Our goal is to provide an easy-to-use tool for detecting lung and skin cancer through analyzing images of patients. By providing us with an image of your lungs or skin, our application will show you the probability of you having cancer.
introPage2Body: Early detection of cancer is crucial for successful treatment, and our application aims to make that process more accessible and convenient for everyone. We understand that receiving a cancer diagnosis can be overwhelming, and we want to provide a resource that can help you take control of your health.
introPage3Body: Our application uses advanced technology to analyze your images and provide an accurate assessment of your risk for cancer. We take your privacy and security seriously, and your images will be securely stored and protected.
introPage4Title: An ounce of prevention is better than a pound of cure
introPage4Body: If our application detects a high probability of cancer, we encourage you to seek medical attention from a healthcare professional immediately. Our application is not a substitute for professional medical advice, but rather a tool to help you take charge of your health and get the care you need.
